meanings.definition: A person who is especially competent to pass critical judgments in an art, particularly one of the fine arts, or in matters of taste.
meanings.sent1: Art connoisseurs can tell you which paintings are the best.
meanings.sent2: The connoisseurs at the gallery appreciated the intricate brushwork.
meanings.sent3: The connoisseurs at the museum argued over the authenticity of the artwork.
meanings.sent4: She was a connoisseur of fine wines, able to distinguish subtle flavors.
meanings.sent5: The connoisseurs' keen eye for detail made them sought after in the art world.

meanings.definition: A person with expert knowledge or training, especially in the fine arts.
meanings.sent1: The connoisseurs of classical music could identify the composer just by listening.
meanings.sent2: As a connoisseur of literature, she could recommend the best books to read.
meanings.sent3: The connoisseurs of fashion always knew the latest trends before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: He was a connoisseur of antique furniture, able to spot valuable pieces at a glance.
meanings.sent5: The connoisseurs' passion for art drove them to study and learn as much as they could.
